mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee(employeeId, password, name, phoneNumber, role, saleHistory) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{role}, #{saleHistory})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM employee WHERE role = 3 ORDER BY saleHistory DESC
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE employeeId = #{employeeId} AND password = #{password}
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE role = 3 AND employeeId = #{employeeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET saleHistory = saleHistory + 1 WHERE employeeId = #{employeeId}
